name: Scott Norris
text: Great teachers and prices. The kids love it there and the performances are so much fun.

name: Strawberry Fox
text: Very impressed with how well organized ms Lisa is to have so many students and classes! And the recitals are top notch and well managed! The facility is also first rate for gymnastics training. We love Flip City!!!

name: Mandy Longshore
text: My daughter started at Flip City 3 years ago. Within the first year, she could do a back walk over and a back handspring, she’s only 6! I wouldn’t go anywhere else in Baldwin County but here! The owners and coaches are amazing!

name: Abby Bourgeois
text: I have been at flip city for 8 months. This is a wonderful place. When I came to flip city, I could only do a bridge, cartwheel,handstand, and a round off. Now they have taught me a bridge kickover, back walkover, handstand walks, and much more. I am now on the gymnastics team. I hope you or you child come join Flip City. Thank you flip city for all you do. The coaches are amazing to!

name: Helen CRESCENZI
text: We Love it here!!!! This is our 2nd Month so far so good! Looking forward to hearing some feedback from Coach

name: Umbrella Oats Gacha
text: It was really good

name: Nettie
text: It's great my granddaughter is taking it

name: unicornsandchangelings
text: Great place for dance shoes! The service there is amazing and the attendant there was very helpful in helping me find shoes that fit. Thank you!

name: Loran Wood
text: I am starting out my career as a baton twirler and have asked them many questions and they have been nothing but nice to me. Great customer service. Great products. Amazing store!!!!!

name: April Woodward
text: Fantastic selection, great experience. Had to drive two hours from the larger city of Tallahassee to find a store with a good selection of pointe shoes (and leotards and everything else!!) I sure wish you'd open a second location in Tallahassee! We would love to have you!!

name: Kevin Snyder
text: Very nice little shop with tons of inventory. Knowledge of what all the dance schools need and allow.

name: Brooke Elizabeth Foist
text: I shop here for basically everything for dance or gymnastics! They have such a huge selection! Definetley my favorite place to shop for dance items!

name: Clint McBroom
text: Wide variety of costumes and dance accessories including shoes. Very helpful and friendly employees.

name: Tabitha Woods
text: VERY FRIENDLY  AND HELPFUL

name: Felicia Shaw
text: Very nice people and willing to help you find what you need😁

name: Estella Eady
text: They are always so sweet...

name: Ben Adkison
text: Very nice folks.

name: Areleya McGriff
text: Friendly service

name: Tiffany Swan
text: Everything you're dancer needs including an expert pointe shoe fitter!

name: Caitlin Maddox
text: We had a great experience here! They were so helpful in finding my little ones shoes and made us feel so welcomed! They have a great inventory of all things dance at a great price too. I highly recommend shopping here

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Erica W
text: They are always nice and professional and they always have the items I need for my daughter's ballet classes

resp.text: Thank you! We love our customers and enjoy helping you find just the right shoes and leotards.

name: Julie Hudzik
text: Candace and her staff are always professional and helpful. So much so that we drove down from Birmingham for pointe shoe fittings. We also love the variety and quality of dancewear available in the store. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you shopping with us and are always happy to help!

name: Tomasina Garner
text: Lots of options for both dancers and gymnasts. The ladies there are very friendly and helpful.

name: Scott Horror
text: Great service, wide (and I mean WIDE) range of products/brands/styles/colors/sizes. It's pretty easy to find stuff in store. Sometime products can be a little pricey, but they do offer a price match in store that I use often because I'd rather buy stuff in store than online (I think it says specifically that they'll match prices "to the best of their abilities").

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us! We try to price our dancewear competitively and will price match if we can. We want you to “shop local”.

name: DeMonica Jeter
text: This boutique was recommended to me by a family friend while I was visiting the area. The ladies that run the shop are very attentive and made sure I had exactly what i was looking for. They also have military discount which is a plus.

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us! I hope you'll come see us again when you're back in town.

name: J J
text: Precious little dance store. Found exactly what we needed- shoes, 2 dance outfits, and tights. Saved us after another local dance store was somewhat rude. We had no idea where else to go until googling Bou Cou. Was a little tricky to find since it is tucked back from the road, but parking was great and it was a nice quiet location.

name: Latrecia Pierce
text: Very Nice place. Had praise danceware in stock but expensive.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us! We do have dancewear for all budgets, so please ask if you're looking for a lower price option. And we do offer group discounts!

name: Ori X
text: Very helpful! Love it 🌼

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by! We’re always happy to help 😊

name: Stephanie Mckinnie
text: Nice place

resp.text: Thank you - come back and see us soon!

name: tiffany moore
text: Always a great trip

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us!

name: Erica Bridgman
text: Excellent service!!

resp.text: Thank you for shopping with us!

name: Theresa Ramirez
text: Great place to shop.  Best customer service ever!!! Our dance team loves the dresses and everything else we bought them.

name: No
text: The owner helped me find exactly what I needed for a super last minute first dance class for my daughter. She was so helpful and knowledgeable. We will be shopping here for dancewear as long as we are in Montgomery.

name: J J
text: Oh, we were so bummed visiting this store. We had intended to buy dance shoes x 2 and at least one cute dance outfit. We were greeted immediately upon entering the store.  They have a wonderful selection. We mentioned the shoes first and the lady working asked if we were ready to buy them. We hesitated because we hadn't even seen the shoes, nor did we know how the fit and feel would be. She informed us that they don't fit shoes until people are ready to buy. We just didn't know what to say so we took a quick look at the shoes and then turned around and walked out. We just couldn't commit on the spot to buying shoes for a toddler without seeing and trying them on especially since she is between shoe sizes. So disappointing. We love supporting local businesses but thought this encounter could have been handled differently on their end. Sadly, we are back to square one looking for shoes and dancewear.

name: Andrea Curtis
text: Excellent place to purchase dance items at a decent price

name: Amanda Murray
text: Great little place. Walked in looking for a few certain things and was helped right away! Definitely will be back!

name: Mikki D.
text: The people here are so nice and the environment is absolutely lovely. They have an abundance of dancewear from Leotards to Pointe Shoes to Legwarmers at an affordable price and amazing quality.

name: Angie Handley
text: Always a great experience.

name: Wendy Blame
text: Great service.  Very patient fitting pointe shoes for my daughter.

name: Krystal Littrell
text: Very friendly and sweet staff. I had to make a couple of visits because my daughter has a dance recital coming up and they were very helpful in helping me get what I needed. We also made a stop to just shop for a few outfits and they were very friendly. Definitely recommend!!!

name: Jessica Jones
text: This place is amazing!! Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable as well.

name: Kierra MCcarroll
text: I've got everything that my kids need it for dance. love the place very nice friendly people thanks so much for the help.

name: BettyJo Pitts
text: Nice local dance supply store. Very friendly and they have everything you need!

name: Margaret Bemis Sharp
text: Everyone was so helpfula and sweet. Great selection of dance attire for little girls. Very helpful with fitting shoes. So many cute things that my daughter fell in love with right away!

name: Shealyn Patterson
text: I went there at 4 pm on Thursday. The hours of operation said open until 6 pm. No one was around except 2 dogs. I guess they should change their hours of operation sign. Unless they are out of business.

resp.text: I’m sorry that happened to you. Our hours changed due to COVID. We update our Facebook/instagram pages, google and yelp forums as well. Even our answering machine has our hours listed. Starting Monday October 5th we will resume regular hours.

name: Krystal Hiatt (Surviving Life)
text: Nice place to find the stuff you need for dance and gymnastics. We have used them for all our needs for 7 years now. The people are nice, the facility is clean and well maintained and they always seem to have what we need.

name: A
text: Beautiful store. They were so kind and did an excellent job fitting my daughter for her first pair of pointe shoes. I am glad we went here!

name: Amber A
text: Absolutely amazing store for all your gymnastic and dance needs. The people are friendly, helpful and they really care about helping you get what you need or want for yourself or your little one(s).

name: Thatrandomgorl
text: Good service and dance supplies.

name: Amy Eldridge
text: Not only was there a huge selection of dance wear but also bows glitter and gifts, even if my child doesnt stay in dance I will definatly keep them in mind for gifts and pretties.

name: Kimberly Page Albins
text: Great selection and good service

name: Lynetia Crowe
text: Friendly & helpful & has everything you might need! Reasonable prices too!

name: Frank Modarelli
text: Carmen and Brandi will get you taken care of.  Great selection.  Wonderful experience.

name: Bridgot Peters
text: We love the shop owners at dance depot. They are always very helpful.

name: Courtney Mott
text: First time there. EVERYONE was friendly and super helpful! Will be back again soon.

name: Tara Crawford
text: Waited on someone to help me and the lady never came up, so I left

name: Angela Busby
text: Great local dance shop!

name: Jasmine Sellers
text: I drove out here during normal business hours and they are closed. No one answers the phone or anything. Not a happy camper at all.

resp.text: I am so sorry that happened to you. We follow the public school systems schedule with the holidays. We were out of town and our phones were messed up. We always have a recorder with our hours listed on them. Another option be to check our Facebook and Instagram page. I apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused you.

name: Hunter Livery
text: Great merchandise, with friendly knowledgeable staff.

name: EMILY TUCKER
text: Just visiting with family

name: Nichoas Lattrell
text: Prices are a little high. Never really any discounts

name: Audrey Wright
text: Awesome!

name: Jeanna Romans
text: Extremely patient and professional! The store was immaculate.

name: April Robinson
text: Great and pretty dance shop! Very helpful as well.

name: Andrea McLemore
text:
Best place for all your dance things
!

name: lee A
text: This is a GREAT place to shop both of the ladies was very nice. Awesome service with no wait time they asked what we needed & got right on it. They was also kid friendly ☺

name: Ashlee Eastham
text: Customer service is great! They always help us find what we are looking for.

name: Vanessa Chandler
text: My daughter was fitted for her first pair of pointe shoes.🥰 The assistance we received was On Point! The sales associate was patient, knowledgeable and enthusiastic! We had a great experience.

name: Crystal Gentle
text: Always an exceptional experience. I highly recommend. Your princess will definitely have a "Princess" moment.

name: Alicia Tanner
text: We love Pointe Dancewear!! They are always so helpful and make our girls feel special ❤️

name: April Stevenson
text: Very friendly and helpful staff.  Prices are comparable to other dance stores.

name: itsMista 2u
text: Came here to get some things for my daughter for dance class. They seem to have a lot of merchandise and the staff were friendly and helpful

name: Nicholas Nicholas
text: Very helpful and pleasant staff.  Made the experience great.

name: Lorna Bogan
text: The staff here are very helpful. They got me in and out of the store quickly with exactly what I needed!

name: Ashley Kelly
text: Awesome people, and a great variety. The staff is very friendly and helpful,

name: Olivia Buchanan
text: Great selection of dancewear here, albeit expensive but every dancer already knows the sport isn't cheap 😅

name: Sankeithia Sellers
text: Great people, nice atmosphere, & wonderful selections for all your dance needs!

name: Donna
text: Excellent selection and friendly staff!

name: Dorothy Seitz
text: Always helpful and friendly

name: Jacqueline Wilson
text: Today was our first visit there. The owner was so sweet and kind. She went above and beyond to make sure my daughter's tap shoes fit comfortably. I did not know they were taking appointments only at this time due to the Covid.  She was able to get us in at the last moment. Thank you for your excellent customer service. We will be back!!

name: Bonnie Ferguson
text: They have everything you need. Very sweet and helpful owner.

name: Melissa Leigh Smith
text: I purchased my 1st pair of pointe shoes from Mrs. Freddie at age 8 and now 27 years later she perfectly fitted yet another pair for me to teach in. She's amazing!!

name: Alana Henderson
text: I have been coming here for my Ballet, Pointe, Tap and Jazz shoes for over 20 years, today I visited and bought my daughter's first pair of Jazz shoes. Customer service is still amazing, just as I remembered. Helpful and sweet. True southern hospitality! Thanks!

name: Melissa Johnson
text: The lady working at the store is absolutely wonderful! Made our whole experience amd my daughter felt like the best dsncer when we left! Thank you for that!!!

name: Ororo Munroe
text: An experienced, friendly, and knowledgeable staff. 70+ years experience between them

name: ava cast
text: They have sweetest woman working there, they are very very educated pointe shoe fitters as well. My over all experience was amazing!

name: Brandi Usher
text: If you need pointe shoes, there's no better place in the Birmingham area! These ladies will work tirelessly to find the right fit. They are super knowledgeable about the shoes and care so much about the girls they serve. We love it here!

name: Megan Frye
text: Had the heardest time finding shoes for my 3 year old. She has such small feet and I went everywhere I could think of, so as a last ditch effort I checked this store and was so amazed as how much effort they put into finding her the perfect fit!

name: Karlee Moses
text: went to get new pair of jazz shoes for my dance competition and they were very helpful!! They even gave me some wool to put in the tip of the shoe! Very recommended

name: Peggy Townes
text: We so appreciate the selection and care with which these precious ladies will help our students be equipped for ballet class. They are wonderful!

name: Karmen Hadley
text: The ladies are so sweet and knowledgeable. We are always so happy to get our dance things from them.

name: Faith Brigmon
text: Drove all the way from Gadsden and they said they were open, sign said they would be back at 12:25. We arrived at 12:30 and waited until 12:50. Would NOT recommend.

name: Laura McKenzie
text: For pointe shoe fittings this is the place to go. You'll always find friendly and professional help.

name: Jackie Brown
text: The ladies who work there are very sweet. They helped me getting my daughter's first dance apparel 😃

name: MELANIE ROBERTS
text: 13 years of shopping! Its great!

name: Paul Hood
text: Ryan high

name: Tanisha Craig
text: They were so kind and patient with me
